actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny any deduction for cleanup and damage costs attributable to certain oil spills in navigable waters.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disallow an income tax deduction for business expenses incurred as removal or liability costs resulting from the discharge from a vessel onto navigable waters of oil being transported by or for the taxpayer. Applies this deduction denial retroactively with respect to amounts incurred in taxable years 1989 and thereafter.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny any deduction for cleanup and damage costs attributable to certain oil spills in navigable waters.
